page.title: 13Traffic, Rangeworthy
page.content:
{The village of Rangeworthy and the {hamlet of Bagstone}are split up by the main road, the B4058, which is heavily used by cars and lorries going back and forth to Yate and other places. {A survey of this traffic}during a weekday afternoon in July recorded 313 vehicles in 1 hour. 167 of them were going in the direction of Yate and 146 were going towards Cromhall.
{To Yate To Cromhall {Cars }110 76 {Lorries }22 28 {Vans }22 30 {Buses }1 0 {M/Cycles }2 2 {Bicycles }6 6 {Others }4 4 { Total }167 146
{This subject is continued on Page 14
